name: Peek (Gelubra)
description:
You need a 16:9 Monitor so the game can properly work. The Game has no save files. If you have any feedback feel free to let me know. 
If you have trouble with the main menu, try to click on a Selection while the eye is closed.
You can only move if you cant see.
The Big Red Eyes are your friends and function as Jumppads, try to jump the moment you land on them to gain height.
